subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Entering the final round of the Sony Open with a four-shot lead, K. J. Choi struggled in blustery conditions Sunday at Waialae Country Club in Honolulu and held off a late charge by Rory Sabbatini to close with a one-over-par 71, the first Sony Open champion in 41 years with a final round over par.Sabbatini managed six birdies in windy conditions, but he three-putted the final hole for par from 65 feet for a 68, leaving him three shots behind.
